bitfield.description: If written with 1, generates a Soft Reset request to the Reset
If written with 1, generates a Hard Reset request to the Reset

Indicates if POR was caused by an SVSL trip condition in the PS
Indicates if POR was caused by an SVSMH trip condition int the
Indicates if POR was caused by a BGREF not okay condition in th
Indicates if POR was caused by a VCCDET trip condition in the P
Write 1 clears all PSS Reset Flags in the RSTCTL_PSSRESET_STAT
Indicates if POR was caused by PCM due to an exit from LPM3.5
Indicates if POR was caused by PCM due to an exit from LPM4.5
Write 1 clears all PCM Reset Flags in the RSTCTL_PCMRESET_STAT
Indicates if POR was caused by RSTn/NMI pin based reset event i
Write 1 clears the RSTn/NMI Pin Reset Flag in RSTCTL_PINRESET_S
Indicates if Reboot reset was caused by the SYSCTL module.
Write 1 clears the Reboot Reset Flag in RSTCTL_REBOOTRESET_STAT
